Package critters.ui

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • critters.ui.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    The class which contains the grid of the Critter's and controls the simulation's data aspects
    Author:
    Neel Drain

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int[] bounds
      Stores the bounds of the grid
      private int CanvasSize
      Stores the size of the UI canvas, to be passed down and used in coordinate calculations
      private critters.ui.GridPoint[][] grid
      The 2D array of GridPoints to store the Critters in the grid
      private int max_population
      Stores the value of the maximum population size of Critters allowed based on the grid size
      private int population
      Stores the total number of Critters in grid
      private java.util.Random random
      The random generator used for the simulation's 'randomness' attribute
      private int timeStep
      Stores which time step (from initial = 0) the simulation is in

      • Grid

        public Grid​(int x,
            int y,

        Constructor for Grid
        Parameters:

        y - The y bounds

    • Method Detail

      • DataSetup

        private void DataSetup​()
        Initializes the main data attributes in this class and calls createEmptyGrid()

      • createEmptyGrid

        private void createEmptyGrid​()
        1. Initializes the grid of GridPoints
        2. Sets the population to 0
        3. Calls populateGrid()

      • populateGrid

        public void populateGrid​()
        1. Sets population to a random number given upper bounds by bounds squared /2 2. Generates randomly a Critter at a random, unoccupied coordinate

      • reset

        public void reset​()
        Resets the grid, timeStep and calls createEmptyGrid()

      • findEmptySpace

        private int[] findEmptySpace​()
        Finds the first empty grid coordinate
        Returns:
        an int[] with the empty coordinate value

      • spawnCritter

        public void spawnCritter​(java.lang.String critterCode)
        Spawns a Critter via the Critter.toString mehod, in the next empty location using findEmptySpace()
        Parameters:
        critterCode - The String value given by the Critter.toString which is used as the identifier for the type of Critter

      • incrementTimeStep

        public void incrementTimeStep​()
        1. Increments timeStep
        2. Runs the Critter.exist function (which is the Critter's action per time step method} for each Critter in the grid
        3. Creates a duplicate grid to by modified during the time step
        4. Iterates through Critter's and resolves any actions/deaths/etc..
        5. Calls createEmptyGrid() clearing the grid
        6. Adds remaining Critter's to the grid
        7. Runs through the reproduction simulation of the Critters via their reproduction value
        8. Calls printGrid()

      • getGrid

        public critters.ui.GridPoint[][] getGrid​()
        Gets the grid
        Returns:
        grid

      • getPopulation

        public int getPopulation​()
        Gets the population of the grid
        Returns:
        population

      • getMaxPopulation

        public int getMaxPopulation​()
        Gets the maximum population max_population possible for the current grid
        Returns:
        max_population

      • printGrid

        public void printGrid​()
        Prints the grid Critter.toString 's to the console
